text: satyavisvasikale, ninnal allahuve suksikkukayum avanre dutanil visvasikkukayum ceyyuka. ennal avanre karunyattil ninnu rant ohari avan ninnalkku nalkunnatanâ€Œ. oru prakasam avan ninnalkk erpetuttittarikayum ceyyum. atukeant ninnalkk (sariyaya patayilute) natannu peakam. ninnalkkavan pearuttutarikayum ceyyum. allahu valareyadhikam pearukkunnavanum karunanidhiyumanâ€Œ
